titleStmt.title: The false test set in a true light.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Jonah Bowyer, at the Rose in Ludgate Street.,

notesStmt.note: Consists of extracts from the Journals of the House of Commons, and the London-Gazette, 1702, in refutation of two "scandalous and villainous papers".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
